content: DSW 1510-CA Wire saw Electric wire saw (15 kW) designed for easier operation on heavy-duty cutting jobs with automatic wire tension, automatic cut steering, and wireless remote control ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Diamond wire and wall saws- - - ### FEATURES:Features Cut Assist – equips diamond wire saws for fully automated cutting. Cut Assist means much higher productivity and more time for other tasks Wireless remote control steering – the operator can stand at a safer distance from the wire saw during the cut Electric box integrated – no extra cables needed Higher initial torque to get the wire started Keyless adjustment of the guide pulleys Applications Structural alterations to buildings or infrastructure – openings of all kinds and almost any shape Sawing anything from heavily reinforced concrete to thick stonework Demolition of structural components – such as bridges, chimneys, tunnels, dams, foundations Sawing in noise-sensitive locations Diamond wire cutting when space is too confined for wall saws ### TECHNICAL DATA: Motor power: 16 kW Power source: Electric Min. generator power: 40 kVA Technical Data | Motor power | 16 kW | Power source | Electric | Min. generator power | 40 kVA | Wire storage capacity | 385.83 in | Weight | 760.59 lb | A-weighted emission sound pressure level | 82.7 dB (A) | 1 | IP protection class | IP 55 (EN 60529) | According to the applicable product standard (see the Operating Instruction for more details) ### ITEMS- 3697329 - WIRE SAW DSW 1510-CA - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 2x DSW-SPP 250 Single-pair pulley - 2x Water supply, flexible, for wire saw - 2x Hose 10m assy - 1x DSW-TS30 UL Tool set - 1x DST WRC-CA HNA Remote control - 1x kpl. Carry belt packed - 1x WRC - vorkonfektioniert Case - 1x Cable - 1x DSW-WG 250 PROTECTIVE COVER
